catalog_specs:
• Building a family tree branch is the starting point.

    It is required and is how a Head-of-Family adds their family and descendant children to their ancestor's family tree.
  • From generation to generation, descendant children (who have children of their own), must build their own family tree branch, at their birth sequence, underneath their parent's branch.
  • Activating descendant child clicks and adding descendant narratives are optional.  All options are applied to a family tree branch.

Steps to Do . . .


  1. Configure Branch Architechture
  2. Build Branch Profile
  3. Implement Branch Photo
  4. Type Branch Narrative
  5. Display Branch Profile
  6. Configure Branch Children
  7. Display Branch Children Names
  8. Configure Family Tree Link
catalog_price:
1. $125.00  (Build and Configure Family Tree Branch.

  2. $15.00  (Per Child Click).

If Child Clicks are not purchased, the child's name will be displayed underneath his/her parent, but will not respond to clicks.
catalog_price_frequency:
• Per (Head-of-Family)
  • Family Tree Branch Narrative Limited to 200 Words.
  • Up to 3 narrative revisions allowed before additional $10.00 charge due.
  • If the family branch head is deceased, the following fields are also displayed:

    1. An Asterisk (*) Indicating Deceased
    2. Year Died, and Age at Death

  • Per (Child Click)
  • The Following fields Are Displayed:
    1. Child Photo
    2. Computed Age
    3. Year Born
  • If child is deceased, the following fields are also displayed:

    1. An Asterisk (*) Indicating Deceased
    2. Year Died, and Age at Death

catalog_specs:
• If you built a family tree branch (above) without including optional child clicks, because the branch was closed (without them) and must be reopened, there's an additional cost to add them.

Steps to Do . . .


  1. Activate Child Click
  2. Display Child Profile when Child Name is Clicked
catalog_price:
$20.00  Per (Child Click)

  • If Child Clicks are not purchased, the child's name will be displayed underneath his/her parent, but will not respond to clicks.
catalog_price_frequency:
• Per (Child Click)
  • The Following fields Are Displayed:
    1. Child Photo
    2. Computed Age
    3. Year Born
  • If child is deceased, the following fields are also displayed:

    1. An Asterisk (*) Indicating Deceased
    2. Year Died, and Age at Death

catalog_specs:
Child Click (and) Narrative Combo


  • Only Family Tree Branches for head-of-family have 200 word narratives included in their price. Child Narratives are at Additional Cost.
  • A child narrative can be used to pay a special tribute, memorialize a dearly departed loved one, give praise, or give a synopsis of a person's life story.

Steps to Do . . .


  1. Activate Child Click
  2. Display Child Profile when Child Name is Clicked
  3. Type Child Narrative
  4. Display Child Narrative when Child's Family Tree Link is Clicked
catalog_price:
$25.00


  • Child narratives are optional.  If not purchased, when the descendant child's Family Tree Link is clicked, no narrative will appear.
catalog_price_frequency:
• Per (Child Narrative)
  • Child Narrative Limited to 200 Words.
  • Up to 3 narrative revisions allowed before additional $10.00 charge due.
